amendment.description: To give effect to more accurate maps of units of the John H. Chafee Coastal Barrier Resources System that were produced by digital mapping.

vote.text: Amendment SA 182 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 182 proposed by Senator Rubio to Amendment SA 112. (consideration: CR S1161; text: CR S1161) To give effect to more accurate maps of units of the John H. Chafee Coastal Barrier Resources System that were produced by digital mapping.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 182 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 182 proposed by Senator Rubio to Amendment SA 112.
